兄弟.definition: brothers; younger brother; CL:個|个[ge4]; I, me (humble term used by men in public speech); brotherly; fraternal

兄弟鬩於墻，外禦其侮.pinyin: xiōng dì xì yú qiáng ， wài yù qí wǔ
兄弟鬩於墻，外禦其侮.definition: internal disunity dissolves at the threat of an invasion from outside (idiom)

兄臺.definition: brother (polite appellation for a friend one's age)

兄長.definition: elder brother; term of respect for a man of about the same age
